mixtral-8x7b_direct_sole-planning_result:
Day 1 (March 8): Arrival in Miami
- Check into a hotel and rest from your travels.
- Enjoy dinner at a local Mexican restaurant.

Day 2 (March 9): Exploring Miami
- Visit the Vizcaya Museum and Gardens, followed by lunch at a nearby American bistro.
- Spend the afternoon exploring Little Havana and try some Cuban cuisine for dinner.

Day 3 (March 10): Flight to Sacramento
- Take a morning flight from Miami to Sacramento.
- Upon arrival, check into your hotel and have lunch at a local Mexican restaurant.
- Spend the afternoon visiting attractions such as the California State Capitol or Old Sacramento.
- Have dinner at an American grill.

Day 4 (March 11): Day in Sacramento
- Start the day with breakfast at a local café.
- Visit the Crocker Art Museum and have lunch at a nearby Mexican spot.
- Spend the afternoon exploring the State Railroad Museum or visiting the California State Indian Museum.
- Have dinner at an American steakhouse.

Day 5 (March 12): Travel to Los Angeles
- Choose one of the following transportation options:
	+ Self-driving (5 hours 55 minutes, 619 km, $30)
	+ Taxi (5 hours 55 minutes, 619 km, $619)
- Upon arrival, check into your hotel and have lunch at a local Mexican restaurant.
- Spend the afternoon exploring attractions such as the Getty Center or Griffith Observatory.
- Have dinner at an American diner.

Day 6 (March 13): Day in Los Angeles
- Start the day with breakfast at a local café.
- Visit the Universal Studios Hollywood and have lunch at a nearby Mexican restaurant.
- Spend the afternoon exploring Santa Monica Pier or Venice Beach.
- Have dinner at an American gastropub.

Day 7 (March 14): Flight to Miami
- Take a flight from Los Angeles back to Miami.
- Upon arrival, check into your hotel and have dinner at a local restaurant of your choice.

Total estimated cost:
- Flights: $1,560 ($780 per person)
- Hotels (assuming 4 nights in Sacramento and 2 nights in Los Angeles, averaging $200 per night): $1,600
- Ground transportation (taxi or self-driving): $30-$619
- Meals: $4,000 (estimated based on a budget of $100 per day for 2 people)

Total estimated cost: $7,200 - $7,819 depending on transportation choice. This plan should fit within your budget, but you may want to allocate more funds towards meals or activities if desired.
